title: Work and Business 2
sentences: We must solve this problem quickly.
My colleague is very reliable and works a lot.
Do you already have a lot of experience in this area?
The job interview was very exhausting yesterday.
Can you please archive these documents?
We are all working very productively on this goal.
I sent my application by email.
Who bears the responsibility for this project?
I hope for a promotion soon.
This document still needs a signature.
Do you like working in a team?
I am doing two hours of overtime today.
My work schedule is very flexible.
He is a very competent employee.
We have to discuss the strategy tomorrow.
Teamwork works well in our department.
She is taking over the leadership of the new team.
What is our most important goal for this year?
Please put the document on my table.
I have an important client appointment tomorrow.
The salary is always paid at the end of the month.
Can you help me with this task?
Our success depends on many factors.
I will send you the offer by this evening.
Are you satisfied with the new software?
dictionary:
lösen - to solve
zuverlässig - reliable

archivieren - to archive
